scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Felicia Koops
scrape.text: I feel like only a good book can make you feel strong feelings for a character, and as I hated the main character a lot, this book would be a good one. I still would not recommend it as the story took a long time to get going and went very slow. The concept, however, was original, and if you are a literature expert, this book would be interesting to read.
